body: Lol at first it was clear they were going for a harem route, even the title make it seem like it, but I guess they change their mind after developing the Aoi route. Now its going bonkers.

The story is diverging way too much that almost has nothing to do with the title anymore and way too many characters to even focus on our main characters (now we got what, 8-10 main characters) with the plot shifting to an anti-Aoi/Souta alliance? Initially I was rooting for Aoi and Captain for MC, now idk anymore. OK here guys, if you wanna read (over 1000 pages of webtoon format, sry I don't know any other source), here we go (I think it's up-to-date right before this chapter 45): https://hitomi.la/manga/asoko-araiya-no-oshigoto-|-traditional-job-of-washing-girls--body-ch.-1-132-english-1973720.html#1
Its like making a cars movie but then it immediately focuses on airplanes 10 minutes in.
What the fuck is up with this series? And why is it titled this way if it stops being like it?
